channel.title: Server on Kev's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Server on Kev's Site

item.title: How to speed up a slow SSH login
item.description: I recently started using the excellent digital ocean for some of my cloud server hosting. When logging into my servers there was quite a delay, often a minute or more, before the password prompt appeared. I was getting the same delay when I use SSH keys for authentication too.
